Module io.inverno.mod.base
Package io.inverno.mod.base.converter

Interface ReactiveConverter<A,B>

Type Parameters:
A - the encoded type
B - the decoded type
All Superinterfaces:
Converter<A,B>, Decoder<A,B>, Encoder<B,A>, ReactiveDecoder<A,B>, ReactiveEncoder<B,A>
All Known Subinterfaces:
MediaTypeConverter<From>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ByteBufConverter, JacksonByteBufConverter, JacksonStringConverter, JsonByteBufMediaTypeConverter, JsonStringMediaTypeConverter, NdJsonByteBufMediaTypeConverter, NdJsonStringMediaTypeConverter, TextByteBufMediaTypeConverter, TextStringMediaTypeConverter
public interface ReactiveConverter<A,B> extends Converter<A,B>, ReactiveDecoder<A,B>, ReactiveEncoder<B,A>

A reactive converter.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
